name: Lama Kingdom
description:
Lama Kingdom is a game where you play as a Rat Cook who is determined to prevent the balloon mice from stealing his pizzas. To defend himself he has hired flame throwing ducks and protects them with giant pizzas.

This great cook uses the evil mice to top his pizzas. Will he be able to keep his business going long enough to make a fortune?

If you want see more of my projects : https://loriusd5.wixsite.com/lorielparis
